message.body: Just an FYI. The water pump in the barn is frozen. I had to bring water from the house to the barn
Ohhhh great. Thanks for the heads up, hopefully it thaws tomorrow
I took the double spicket piece off and the pump is iced inside. Nick says he had a torch that could be used to thaw it. Said to contact him tomorrow and maybe try using it.
He asked if maybe Richard could do it? Let me know whatcha think
Oh ok I vaguely remember this from last winter! Yup, I'll get Richard on it, wish us luck...
Haha they have water for the night. You guys are the best!
